name: Tales of Sin Breaker (Boss Demo)
description:
Just a little test demo on a boss fight i am creating for a game idea I have in mind. Tell me your thoughts and feels on the battle (if it to hard, to long, to easy?). I would like your feedback to on what i could do to make the game pop.

Tip: The purple crystal in the game rise your level up by 10. The cap for this demo is 20.
